create table transaction_aggregation_daily ( id VARCHAR2(127) not null, account_id VARCHAR2(127) not null, category_id VARCHAR2(127),
transaction_id VARCHAR2(127) not null, category_id VARCHAR2(127) not null, constraint PK_TRANSACTIONS_CATEGORIES primary key (transaction_id, category_id), constraint FK_TRANSACT_CATEGORIE_TRANSACT foreign key (transaction_id) references Transaction (id), constraint FK_TRANSACT_TRANSACTI_CATEGORI foreign key (category_id) references Categories (id) );
